long_description: The Omega Pacific Solution Nut Tool brings together a number of vital features and has a very thin profile so you can retrieve gear you'd otherwise give up on. Working end of the tool features a dimple to rest against stubborn nuts to pop them loose. There's also a hook for pulling on unreachable cam trigger bars; there's even a little nub that's perfect for pulling on the cavity of a cam's lobe. Opposite end of the tool is flat, instead of rounded, so you can strike frustrating nuts or stoppers. Includes a 0.5 in. wrench for tightening loose bolts. Omega Pacific Solution Nut Tool can also be used to open up a celebratory post-climb beverage.
short_description: The Omega Pacific Solution Nut Tool brings together a number of vital features and has a very thin profile so you can retrieve gear you'd otherwise give up on.
